name: The Death Loop (Droei)
description:
A devlog on the game is coming soon at my YouTube channel! Feel free to check it out!:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWnfpwx93mLw13ZxHYs_FHg?view_as=subscriber

Thanks for checking out my game!
This is my first attempt on 2D pixel art!

The gameplayloop is all about dying and using the knowledge of how you died to progress through the game!

I took it really easy for this jam so if you are curious of my other/ better projects, feel free to check out my Itch page!: https://droei.itch.io/

The entire project source can be found here: https://gitlab.com/detre_daan/ludum-dare-47
